message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial to you. I'm asking for $10,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider adjusting your price?
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to go above $8,000. Could we possibly meet closer to my offer?
